findings.title: Transfer Receives Fees
findings.description: In the _transfer() function fees are deducted from the amount, causing the receiver to get less than desired every time.

findings.title: Variable Shadowing
findings.description: The owner variable used in the allowance function shadows the Ownable contractâ€™s owner function.
findings.location: Oracula.sol, owner(), approve(address owner, address spender, uint256 amount), allowance(address owner, address spender) functions

findings.title: Boolean Equality
findings.description: Boolean constants can be used directly and do not need to be compared to true or false
